Imports

trscore

Types

ArithmOp = enum
  aopVal, aopSucc, aopAdd, aopMult
Arithm = object
  case tsym: ArithmOp
  of aopVal:
      tval: int

  else:
      tsubt: seq[Arithm]

  
ATerm = Term[Arithm, ArithmOp]

Lets

arithmImpl = TermImpl[Arithm, ArithmOp](getSym: proc (n: Arithm): ArithmOp = result = n.tsym, isFunctorSym: proc (
    n: ArithmOp): bool = result =
  not (n == aopVal), makeFunctor: proc (op: ArithmOp; sub: seq[Arithm]): Arithm =
  result = Arithm(tsym: op)
  result.tsubt = sub, getArguments: proc (n: Arithm): seq[Arithm] = result = n.tsubt, valStrGen: proc (
    n: Arithm): string = result = "0")
rSystem = makeReductionSystem(@[makeRulePair(
    makeMatcher(nOp(aopAdd, @[nVar("A"), nConst(0)])), makeGenerator(nVar("A"))), makeRulePair(
    makeMatcher(nOp(aopAdd, @[nVar("A"), nOp(aopSucc, @[nVar("B")])])),
    makeGenerator(nOp(aopSucc, @[nOp(aopAdd, @[nVar("A"), nVar("B")])]))), makeRulePair(
    makeMatcher(nOp(aopMult, @[nVar("A"), nConst(0)])), makeGenerator(nConst(0))), makeRulePair(
    makeMatcher(nOp(aopMult, @[nVar("A"), nOp(aopSucc, @[nVar("B")])])), makeGenerator(
    nOp(aopAdd, @[nVar("A"), nOp(aopMult, @[nVar("A"), nVar("B")])])))])
